entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
